RivalMerchant.Name: Merchant Aganir
RivalMerchant.FlavorText: Note to self : "I hate this guy"

Troll.Name: The Troll of Dimaks
Troll.FlavorText: A legendary troll, known for owning the record of the home run contest at 279279 meters.

WanderingWarrior.Name: The Blade of Asmax
WanderingWarrior.FlavorText: The guy sure got skill, adventurers should defy it at their own risks.

BillionSlime.Name: Slimillion
BillionSlime.FlavorText: It's a billion slimes packed into what look like one entity

Dragon2.Name: The Great Black Dragon with Red Eyes, Purple Nail Polish, Iridescent Scales and who distribute the gift of eyeliner

Kieran.Name: Kieran
Kieran.FlavorText: He was a lot cheaper when he was known as KKSweet

Astunavulcar.Name: Astunavulcar
Astunavulcar.FlavorText: Magus studying strange pandemic throught dubious experimentations.

Tongers.Name: Tongers
Tongers.FlavorText: So called adventurer wandering in town.

Touf.Name: Touf
Touf.FlavorText: Wandering artist, stealing joy from the richs to give it to the poors

LynnqueSisnine.Name: Lynnque Sisnine
LynnqueSisnine.FlavorText: Looking for the sacred eggplant and peach to attain eternal life

Zorgzor.Name: Zorgzor
Zorgzor.FlavorText: A troll looking for tasty rocks

MuddyCavern.Name: Muddy's Cavern
MuddyCavern.FlavorText: "Mud is dangerous... It could kill you !"

GreenKirby.Name: Dr. KÃ¸r B. Vert
GreenKirby.FlavorText: Stay away from the cellar. He has a big cat tho.

sahd.Name: Sahd
sahd.FlavorText: Stay away from the cellar. He has a big cat tho.

frarl.Name: Frarl
frarl.FlavorText: We're not really sure why he is here, but he always has nice gossips.

MiloFosc.Name: Milo Fosc
MiloFosc.FlavorText: Master of the overly complicated card game of "Crapotin", and he only plays it for money !

CatiCatou.Name: Cati Catou
CatiCatou.FlavorText: Cati is specialized in moving people around in his pure white coach.

KhaShan.Name: Kha'Shan
KhaShan.FlavorText: He's a veteran adventurer who, although cold at first glance, will be happy to share a beer with you.
